title: Major Feature Release
description: Added comprehensive search functionality, creator profiles with detailed bios, trending kits section, related kits recommendations, compatibility badges for platform support, request-a-kit submission form, activation checklist for new agents, and share buttons across all kit pages.

title: Bootstrap & Skill Page Improvements
description: Enhanced agent bootstrap experience with improved onboarding flow and activation checklist. Upgraded skill pages with better documentation display, installation instructions, and compatibility information.

title: Initial Launch
description: Launched forAgents.dev with core features: agent news feed, skills directory, MCP servers catalog, registered agents directory, and machine-readable API endpoints (.md and .json formats).
